com.percussion.extensions.general
Class PSFormatFileTree

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSDefaultExtension
      com.percussion.extensions.general.PSFormatFileTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSResultDocumentProcessor
public class PSFormatFileTree
extends PSDefaultExtension
implements IPSResultDocumentProcessor

This class is a Rhythmyx ResultDocumentProcessor extension. It is used to reformat a list of file path names contained in an XML result tree into a true tree structure. This will be used to display file lists in the Rhythmyx Content Manager User Interface. See details in processResultDocument. This extension may have no value outside of the Content Manager UI.

Author:
David Benua
